The game can be paused and can be played next time without restarting. Operation method: first press the "S/P" button to pause the game, then press the "ON/OFF" button to shut down, next time you play, first press the "ON/OFF" button to turn on, and then press the "S/P" button first Start the game.    Powered by 2*AA battery, 2 AA batteries can be used for 1 month (depending on the battery the quality of).
